Package fr.inrialpes.exmo.ontowrap

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HeavyLoadedOntology<O>
    Encapsulate deep access to an ontology through some Ontology API Asserted methods corresponds to the information explicitely given or stored about the entity.
    LoadedOntology<O>  
    Ontology<O>  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Annotation  
    BasicOntology<O>
    Store the information regarding ontologies in a specific structure
    OntologyCache<O extends LoadedOntology<? extends Object>>
    This caches the loaded ontologies so that it is possible to share them between alignments as well as to unload them if necessary.
    OntologyFactory  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OntowrapException
    Base class for all Ontowrap Exceptions.
